name: Draw (Harsha-Games)
description:
In this game, the pen really is mightier than the sword. Create platforms to solve puzzles! Use different pen colors to defeat enemies and erase walls! It even includes a secret mode! Can you beat all 64 levels without running out of ink?
—————— CONTROLS ——————
Arrow keys/WAD — Move
Click and drag — Draw
Space — Switch pen (after level 20)
R — Restart
Z — Skip forward
X — Skip backward
C — View level's help screen
P — Pause (secret mode: restart game)
—————— FAQ ——————
• "How do I beat this level?" — Press C to view the help screen. If you're really having trouble, press Z to skip.
• "How do I erase?" — You can press R to restart the level. You also gain an eraser on level 25.
• "I've run out of ink!" — If you have 0% ink, restart the level with R and it'll restore 25%.
